name: ContentSubmissions_GetContentSubmission
description:
Gets a ContentSubmission by ID. When successful, the response is the requested ContentSubmission.
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

contentSubmissionID.description: The ID of the ContentSubmission to get.

includeAttributes.description: Names of Attributes to include when retrieving this submission. This should be a comma-separated list.

$ul: **Attributes**: Attributes of this ContentSubmission
**BuildID**: ReadOnly. The ID of the Azure DevOps Build which will build the content package.
**ContentDefinitionID**: The ID of the Content Definition.
**ContentSubmissionID**: The ID of this Content Submission.
**Definition**: The definition of the content for submission
**Attributes**: Attributes of this ContentDefinition
**ContentDefinitionID**: The ID of this content definition.
**Description**: The description used on the package type in the AGCO Update System
**Name**: The name of this content. Name must be valid for Attribute on PackageType.
**PackageTypeID**: Read Only. The ID of the package type used for this content.
**TypeID**: The type of content.
**JobRunID**: ReadOnly. The ID of the JobRun which will build the content package.
**PackageID**: The ID of package generated by this content submission.
**ReleaseNotes**: Release Notes for this ContentSubmission
**Repository**: The SVN repository used as the source of this content submission
**Revision**: The SVN revision used as the source of this content submission.
**SubmissionDate**: Read Only. The UTC date and time the content submission was made.
**UserID**: Read Only. The ID of the user who submitted the content
**Version**: Optional.  The version number assigned to this Content Submission and the resulting Package.
**DeveloperMessage**
**ErrorCode**
**MoreInfo**
**UserMessage**
